title: AI-Enhanced Blended Learning for Strengthening Science Project-Based Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and project management experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning using digital devices, with AI analytics tools monitoring learning patterns and providing personalized feedback

learning_goals: Learners can analyze learning engagement patterns using AI analysis tools and improve personalized learning strategies by over 80%
Learners improve their digital literacy skills by over 25% while performing PBL tasks in a blended learning environment
Learners can proactively identify risk factors during project progress using AI-based predictive models and implement over 70% of improvement measures
Learners can increase knowledge-sharing efficiency among team members by over 30% using collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
